share-your-thoughts: Share your thoughts about this one...
message1: The purpose of this site is to create reliable base of ice cream and reviews, where everyone can drop an opinion.
message2: Currently we are working on user experience improvement and also adding some new features. Have a nice cream! :)
message3: Life is to short to eat bad ice cream.
faq1: 1. Why I can not drop an opinon without account?
ans1: It is necessary to restrain bot activity.
faq2: 2. How much does it cost to use icebunch.com?
ans3: We finance the website with private money. Advertising helps us with domain, hosting and license costs.
